caller_intent: The caller, Gloria from Alliance Insurance, wanted to verify the active status of a commercial policy for 'Good Old Days Car Wash, Inc.' using account number 9743309.
resolution_steps: Agent Brandi requested the caller's name, policy/account number, and policyholder name.
Verified the account number and confirmed the policyholder's name.
Checked the policy status in Liberty Mutual's system.
Informed the caller the policy is active (effective July 8, 2025–July 8, 2026).
Closed the call after confirming no further assistance was needed.
knowledge_required: Access to Liberty Mutual's policy database
systems_referenced: Liberty Mutual's internal policy management system
summary: An Alliance Insurance agent verified a commercial policy's active status for a client via Liberty Mutual's system. The agent confirmed the policy was active and provided the effective dates. The caller was satisfied and ended the conversation.
